::: {#me}
### About Me

I am a dentist and health economist researching topics relating to health financing, health workforce, dentistry and global health. I am currently undertaking [Wellcome Trust/ NIHR School for Primary Care Research](https://www.spcr.nihr.ac.uk/career-development/doctoral-training-programme-for-primary-care-clinicians) funded Doctoral Research Fellowship, investigating the effect of financial incentives on access and quality of NHS dental care in the UK.

### Education

-   **PhD in Health Economics**\
    *University of Manchester* (2024-2027)

-   **MSc Economics of Public Policy**\
    *Barcelona School of Economics* (2023-2024)

-   **MSc Public Health (Health Economics)**\
    *London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine* (2019-2020)

-   **Bachelor of Dental Surgery**\
    *Queen Mary, University of London* (2015-2021)

### Experience

-   **Pre-Doctoral Clinical Research Fellow**\

-   **General Dental Practitioner**\
    *National Health Service (NHS)* (2021-2024)

-   **President**\
    *European Dental Students' Association (EDSA)* (2020-2021)
